DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: Ford Sales Jump in Japan : Even while it grouses at Japanese auto_makers , Ford Motor Co . reported that its sales in Japan through August of this year totaled 8 # 744 units , up 152 % over last year . Ford said it expects its vehicle sales in Japan for the full year to be triple the 5 # 400 cars and trucks it sold there in all_of 1993 . Still , Ford officials say , growth has been hampered by Japanese auto_makers , who are reluctant to allow their dealers to sell products made by Detroit ' s Big Three .
